definitions.text:
1. One who sees, discovers or distinguishes; an observer.
2. One who knows and judges; one who has the power of distinguishing.He was a great observer and discerner of mens natures and humors.
3. That which distinguishes; or that which causes to understand.The word of God quick and powerful--a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart. Hebrews 4:12.
